entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 2:40 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times mixed with snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except 25 mm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle mixed with snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
